name: Melinoe - The goddess of ghosts
description:
Melinoe is a greek nymph from the underworld. She can control ghosts which can cause nightmares and drive people insane. The gods Kratos, Hermes and Zeus try to help you staying awake as long as possible by lending you their powers for a short period of time. 

How long can you stay awake? 

Update 1 13.11.2022 20:55 Uhr :

Added Highscore Board

Highscore doesn't show immediately.

Controls: 

WASD - Character Movement

LMB - Fire
